title: Installation Issue | TypeError: LoadLibrary() argument 1 must be str, not None
body:
Windows 10, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2

OS: Windows 10
DeepLabCut Version 2 
Browser Chrome

_Description_

Unable to install DeepLabCut because of the following error:
`TypeError: LoadLibrary() argument 1 must be str, not None`

Full log:

`File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\Scripts\conda-env-script.py", line 5, in <module>
    from conda_env.cli.main import main

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda_env\cli\main.py", line 39, in <module>
    from . import main_create

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda_env\cli\main_create.py", line 12, in <module>
    from conda.cli import install as cli_install

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda\cli\install.py", line 19, in <module>
    from ..core.index import calculate_channel_urls, get_index

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda\core\index.py", line 9, in <module>
    from .package_cache_data import PackageCacheData

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda\core\package_cache_data.py", line 15, in <module>
    from conda_package_handling.api import InvalidArchiveError

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\conda_package_handling\api.py", line 3, in <module>
    from libarchive.exception import ArchiveError as _LibarchiveArchiveError

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\libarchive\__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .entry import ArchiveEntry

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\libarchive\entry.py", line 6, in <module>
    from . import ffi

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\libarchive\ffi.py", line 27, in <module>
    libarchive = ctypes.cdll.LoadLibrary(libarchive_path)

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\ctypes\__init__.py", line 434, in LoadLibrary
    return self._dlltype(name)

  File "C:\Users\asree\Anaconda3\lib\ctypes\__init__.py", line 356, in __init__
    self._handle = _dlopen(self._name, mode)

TypeError: LoadLibrary() argument 1 must be str, not None`


Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Make folder for the project, and proceed to "git clone https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut.git"
2. Try "conda env create -f dlc-windowsGPU.yaml"
3. See error

Additional Info
CUDA: 
NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin\cudnn64_7.dll
